thread.title: EyeforTravel Half-Year Round-Up and Forecast: 2015
thread.title_full: EyeforTravel Half-Year Round-Up and Forecast: 2015 | Travel Industry News & Conferences - EyeforTravel

author: eyefortravel.com
title: EyeforTravel Half-Year Round-Up and Forecast: 2015
text:
EyeforTravel Half-Year Round-Up and Forecast: 2015 Aug 21, 2015 A comprehensive look at the state of the travel industry, the technology landscape, and economic analysis of the world’s major markets To purchase this individual report, please email Simi ( simi@eyefortravel.com ) or become an EyeforTravel premium member (Members have access to all reports and over 900 hours of transcribed conference videos).
Price (for non-premium users): EUR 495 This report rounds up the year so far in travel and also looks forward into 2016 with forecasts and analysis of all the key elements that are changing the marketplace. This report contains:
Market-by-market analysis of the world’s major economies Industry outlooks and investment round-ups An overview of the changes occurring in e- and m-commerce Key company overviews To view a sample of the report click on the image below. To make it easier to read click on the “open in the new window icon”.
Please login to view this whitepaper report in full - or subscribe here
